column4: hey, I've been using Ubuntu Linux for a bit now (near exclusively), and I need to know if there is any way to bring up a process manager above all else, when, for example, a program isn't functioning (and it's fullscreen, and I'd like to either a) shut it down, or b) get to the desktop)
you can set <ctl> <alt> <del> or any other to lauch system monitor
easy for my enemies to find me that way
